objects.query: SELECT Id, Phone, TestObject3__c FROM Account WHERE ID IN ('0010900000Dz0E1AAJ')
SELECT Id, Account__c, TestObject3__c, RecordTypeId FROM TestObject1__c WHERE Account__c IN ('0010900000Dz0E1AAJ') ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 2
SELECT Id, Account__c, TestObject1__c FROM TestObject2__c WHERE Account__c IN ('0010900000Dz0E1AAJ') ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 2

SELECT Id, TestObject2__c FROM TestObject3__c WHERE TestObject2__c IN (SELECT Id FROM TestObject2__c WHERE Account__c IN ('0010900000Dz0E1AAJ') ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 2) AND Id IN ('a020900000360H2AAI')
